title: The 'Indrani' Haaram: A Regal Symphony of Sapphire and Diamonds
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Brilliant Cut Diamonds and a Deep Blue Sapphire. Features our signature Hyderabadi polish for unparalleled lustre.
features: This stunning necklace features a graduating line of baguette-cut diamonds, culminating in a breathtaking pear-shaped sapphire surrounded by a halo of smaller brilliant cut diamonds. The setting emphasizes the brilliance of each stone, creating a dazzling cascade of light. Its design is rooted in traditional haaram aesthetics, but interpreted with clean, modern lines.
colors: deep blue (sapphire). A timeless and elegant color palette.
occasions: or as an heirloom piece for special celebrations like Seemantham or a milestone birthday. Its understated elegance also makes it suitable for upscale parties and galas.
description: The Indrani Haaram is a masterpiece of modern design meeting traditional sensibilities. The sapphire, symbolizing wisdom and royalty, is the focal point. Exceptional diamond quality and superior Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantee a piece that will retain its value and beauty for generations. This haaram offers a luxurious statement without being ostentatious, ideal for the discerning collector.
